hero.subtitle:
Monica is an open-source, local-first password manager.
Credentials, 2FA, and secure notes, all stored strictly on your device.

features.title: Features Overview
features.password_manager_desc: Supports autofill and custom fields. Uses AES-256 encryption. Your data never leaves your device.
features.2fa_desc: Built-in TOTP support. Scan QR codes instantly. Auto-copy next code when expiring.
features.cards_notes_desc: Securely store bank cards, IDs, and private memos. Everything under control.
features.design_desc: Follows Google Material Design 3 guidelines. Dynamic theming, dark mode, and a clean, ad-free interface.

security.title: Security Architecture
security.encryption_desc: Database protected by AES-256-GCM. Master password hashed with PBKDF2-HMAC-SHA256 (100k+ iterations).
security.keystore_desc: Keys are wrapped by the hardware-backed Android Keystore System (TEE/SE), resistant to extraction.
security.network_desc: No internet permissions required. Your vault is offline by default.
